JUDGES: Egidijus Kūris;Guido Raimondi;Helen Keller;Nebojša Vučinić;Paul Lemmens;Robert Spano
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr B. Bedirhanoğlu , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant found his DATE son , PERSON , injured .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG public prosecutor filed an indictment with ORG , accusing ORG , the applicant ’s former wife , of assaulting PERSON and murdering the couple ’s first child , PERSON The applicant joined the criminal proceedings against ORG as a civil party .
CARDINAL . On DATE , after evaluating the medical reports , witness statements and the public prosecutor ’s written opinion , ORG acquitted ORG of the charges against her .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of ORG . This decision was deposited with the registry of ORG on DATE . The president of the court noted on the judgment that the intervening party should be notified . According to the information in the case file , the judgment was not served on the applicant . On DATE he obtained a copy from the registry of the first - instance court .
